document.topic_text: How Do You Compare to the Competition? Get facts about other applicants with a CareerBuilder Account Sign Up Job Description BAE Systems is looking for Operations Support Office, supporting a National Ground Intelligence Center (NGIC) Intelligence mission. Candidate should have 8 years of experience coordinating and managing operations in support of military forces, including planning and managing training, pre-deployment, deployment, sustainment and return of deployed and CONUS-based personnel; and 3 years of experience supporting or conducting counterterrorism, counter insurgency or counter IED analysis and targeting activities. Minimum Education and Experience Bachelor's Degree and 5 years work experience or equivalent experience experience with JWICS , SIPRNET and NIPRNET tools and databases used to support operations. Working knowledge of Microsoft® Office® tools, including SharePoint®. Bachelor's Degree (may substitute 4 years of experience for education requirement) Preferred Skills and Education Background as a military operations officer or NCO at Brigade or Battalion level. Background in supporting a SOF Task Force, counter-terrorism, counter insurgency, or counter IED analysis and previous deployment to Afghanistan. About BAE Systems Intelligence & Security BAE Systems Intelligence & Security, based in McLean, Virginia, designs and delivers advanced defense, intelligence, and security solutions that support the important missions of our customers. Our pride and dedication shows in everything we do-from intelligence analysis, cyber operations and IT expertise to systems development, systems integration, and operations and maintenance services. Knowing that our work enables the U.S. military and government to recognize, manage and defeat threats inspires us to push ourselves and our technologies to new levels. That's BAE Systems. That's Inspired Work. Equal Opportunity Employer/Females/Minorities/Veterans/Disabled/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity/Gender Expression. To see Inspired Work in action, visit www.baesystems.com and follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/baesystemsintel. EEO Career Site Equal Opportunity Employer.
